query.title: Total Beneficiary
query.content: SELECT COUNT(ENTITY_ID) AS TOTAL_CUSTOMER FROM ref_mst_entity WHERE ENTITY_TYPE='Customer' AND STATUS='NORMAL'

query.title: Total Project
query.content: SELECT COUNT(SCHEME_ID) AS TOTAL_SCHEME FROM ref_mst_scheme WHERE STATUS='NORMAL'

query.title: Total Collector
query.content: SELECT COUNT(ENTITY_ID) AS TOTAL_COLLECTOR FROM ref_mst_collector WHERE STATUS='NORMAL'

query.title: Total Location
query.content: SELECT COUNT(LOCATION_ID) AS TOTAL_LOCATION FROM ref_mst_location WHERE STATUS='NORMAL'
